tool.name: mahotas-features
tool.command:
mahotas-features.py #echo ' '.join($inputs)#
--output $default
#if $convert-to-bw and $convert-to-bw is not None: --convert-to-bw $convert-to-bw #end if $haralick $lbp
#if $lbp-radius and $lbp-radius is not None: --lbp-radius $lbp-radius #end if
#if $lbp-points and $lbp-points is not None: --lbp-points $lbp-points #end if

param.label: Convert color images to greyscale. Acceptable values: no: raises an error (default) max: use max projection yes: use rgb2gray

param.label: Radius to use for LBP features
param.name: lbp-radius

param.label: Nr of points to use for LBP features

tool.help: Mahotas is a computer vision and image processing library for Python. This tools computes features using mahotas.
